title: Rebecca Judd shares adorable Christmas family snaps with Santa Claus TWO MONTHS too early
text:
We're over two months away from Christmas.

But AFL WAG Rebecca Judd has decided to kick off celebrations early, taking to her Instagram to share a sweet family portrait with Santa.

The doting mother of four looked to be in good spirits, posing alongside her husband of nine years, Chris Judd and four children.

Too excited for Christmas! AFL WAG Rebecca Judd (pictured, right) took to Instagram to share a series of adorable Christmas family snaps with Santa Claus TWO MONTHS early

Dressing up for the occasion, the 36-year-old Australian model looked chic, in a white button-up blouse and denim three-quarter jeans.

She completed her look in black flats with white poka dots.

Meanwhile, her husband former Australian rules footballer Chris opted for a blue denim button-up shirt and, white trousers and boots.

She captioned the series of snaps: 'Yippee! The Judd family got an early look at the Christmas Santa photo set up at @chadstone_fashion and let me tell you, this year it’s more beautiful than ever.'

Family portrait: The doting mother of four looked to be in good spirits, posing alongside her husband of nine years, Chris Judd (left) and four children

Her fellow Melbourne WAGS and influencer friends, quick to comment underneath the snap.

Former WAG Nadia Bartel commented: 'What a family,' alongside a heart and praised hands emoji.

Rebecca shares four children with sporting legend Chris Judd: Son Oscar, eight, daughter Billie Kate, five, and three-year-old twin sons Tom and Darcy.

Earlier this month the Melbourne based model admitted she draws the line when it comes to sharing certain aspects of her life on social media.

Family: Pictured with Chris, 36, son Oscar, eight, daughter Billie, five, and twin sons Tom and Darcy, three

She told The House of Wellness that she keeps her relationship with her husband private, and is also cautious on what she posts of the couple's four young children.

'I don't do a lot of couple stuff with Chris as we keep that private and tell each other we love each other - we don't need to put it all over social media,' Rebecca said.

'There is also a certain amount of privacy and security when posting about the kids, and I always like them to look like kids,' the TV presenter added.
description: We're over two months away from Christmas.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
